Reviews.Title: “Caveat Emptor !!”

Reviews.Content: abbey courts redeeming factor physical location excellent 2 minutes walk notting hill gate underground otherwise im afraid downhill hotel bedroom stayed bathroom tiny shower system leaked dreadfully onto floor bed tiny honest couldnt vouch linen changed previous occupant anticipating english breakfast set day prepare disappointed breakfast simply acomodate guests time wait food mediocre overall hotel run bb boutique hotel advertised
